mapper.insert: INSERT INTO loan(id, loan_date, return_date, status, user_id, book_isbn) VALUES (NULL, #{loanDate}, #{returnDate}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{bookIsbn})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.title AS bookTitle FROM loan as a JOIN book b ON a.book_isbn = b.isbn WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}
